HeadComp.title: MSG91 - Our team, culture and happy clients.
HeadComp.description: Empowering developers with communication APIs. Building modern communication tools and supporting ideas for startups and enterprises globally.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs 360Dialog
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and 360dialog both offer access to WhatsApp Business API for customer messaging. 360dialog is known for providing direct API access with flexible integration options. MSG91, on the other hand, combines this with advanced features like AI automation, chatbots, and omnichannel tools. Both platforms support scalable communication, but MSG91 is the go-to choice for businesses seeking end-to-end automation and engagement solutions.

content.name: 360Dialog
content.des: 360dialog is a WhatsApp Business API provider known for offering direct API access with minimal platform overhead. It’s often used by developers and SaaS platforms looking for a quick gateway to WhatsApp, but it offers limited built-in tools for marketing automation, customer journey management, or omnichannel engagement.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, in contrast, is an end-to-end communication platform tailored for businesses aiming to scale intelligently. It goes beyond just WhatsApp access — offering AI-driven automation, WhatsApp Flows, chatbots built through natural language prompts, and a unified platform that includes SMS, Email, RCS, and more. With localized pricing and dedicated support, MSG91 empowers brands to create smarter, more efficient customer journeys across channels.

features.pricing: 2499 Per Month along with additional charges on per credit - Marketing: ₹0.871, Utility: ₹0.150, Authentication: ₹0.128
features.omnichannel_communication: Omnichannel Inbox - WhatsApp and Instagram only
features.ai_chatbot_integration: Drag & Drop Chatbot Builder & GPT Chatbot
features.omnichannel_chatbot_support: Offer chatbot customer service across WhatsApp & Instagram
features.whatsapp_payments: Yes, WhatsApp payment support through PayU and Razorpay
features.otp_verification: OTP verification through WhatsApp Business API
features.one_click_verification: Authentication templates include option autofill OTP or copy OTP code
features.unified_platform: one platform for WhatsApp API, WhatsApp & Instagram automation, chatbot, WhatsApp flows and analytics
features.customer_support_quality: Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
